Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefits

firing or reloading a LMG or GPMG the Combat Point cost is 1 less and the Recoil Penalty is reduced by 2, and when firing a LMG or GPMG, the Reflex Saving Throw TN for Autofire is increased to [TN20].
system.summary: Reduced Recoil Penalty, -1 CP, TN 20 autofire saves
